name: Subsemiring.pointwise_smul_def
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
a : M
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul a S) (Subsemiring.map (MulSemiringAction.toRingHom M R a) S)
decl:
theorem pointwise_smul_def {a : M} (S : Subsemiring R) :
    a • S = S.map (MulSemiringAction.toRingHom _ _ a) :=
  rfl

name: Subsemiring.coe_pointwise_smul
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
m : M
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq (↑(HSMul.hSMul m S)) (HSMul.hSMul m ↑S)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_pointwise_smul (m : M) (S : Subsemiring R) : ↑(m • S) = m • (S : Set R) :=
  rfl

name: Subsemiring.pointwise_smul_toAddSubmonoid
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
m : M
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul m S).toAddSubmonoid (HSMul.hSMul m S.toAddSubmonoid)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem pointwise_smul_toAddSubmonoid (m : M) (S : Subsemiring R) :
    (m • S).toAddSubmonoid = m • S.toAddSubmonoid :=
  rfl

name: Subsemiring.smul_mem_pointwise_smul
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
m : M
r : R
S : Subsemiring R
a✝ : Membership.mem S r
⊢ Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul m S) (HSMul.hSMul m r)
decl:
theorem smul_mem_pointwise_smul (m : M) (r : R) (S : Subsemiring R) : r ∈ S → m • r ∈ m • S :=
  (Set.smul_mem_smul_set : _ → _ ∈ m • (S : Set R))

name: Subsemiring.instCovariantClassHSMulLe
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
⊢ CovariantClass M (Subsemiring R) HSMul.hSMul LE.le
decl:
instance : CovariantClass M (Subsemiring R) HSMul.hSMul LE.le :=
  ⟨fun _ _ => image_subset _⟩

name: Subsemiring.mem_smul_pointwise_iff_exists
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
m : M
r : R
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul m S) r) (Exists fun s => And (Membership.mem S s) (Eq (HSMul.hSMul m s) r))
decl:
theorem mem_smul_pointwise_iff_exists (m : M) (r : R) (S : Subsemiring R) :
    r ∈ m • S ↔ ∃ s : R, s ∈ S ∧ m • s = r :=
  (Set.mem_smul_set : r ∈ m • (S : Set R) ↔ _)

name: Subsemiring.smul_bot
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
a : M
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul a Bot.bot) Bot.bot
decl:
@[simp]
theorem smul_bot (a : M) : a • (⊥ : Subsemiring R) = ⊥ :=
  map_bot _

name: Subsemiring.smul_sup
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
a : M
S T : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul a (Max.max S T)) (Max.max (HSMul.hSMul a S) (HSMul.hSMul a T))
decl:
theorem smul_sup (a : M) (S T : Subsemiring R) : a • (S ⊔ T) = a • S ⊔ a • T :=
  map_sup _ _ _

name: Subsemiring.smul_closure
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Monoid M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
a : M
s : Set R
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul a (Subsemiring.closure s)) (Subsemiring.closure (HSMul.hSMul a s))
decl:
theorem smul_closure (a : M) (s : Set R) : a • closure s = closure (a • s) :=
  RingHom.map_closureS _ _

name: Subsemiring.pointwise_central_scalar
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Monoid M
inst✝³ : Semiring R
inst✝² : MulSemiringAction M R
inst✝¹ : MulSemiringAction (MulOpposite M) R
inst✝ : IsCentralScalar M R
⊢ IsCentralScalar M (Subsemiring R)
decl:
instance pointwise_central_scalar [MulSemiringAction Mᵐᵒᵖ R] [IsCentralScalar M R] :
    IsCentralScalar M (Subsemiring R) :=
  ⟨fun _a S => (congr_arg fun f => S.map f) <| RingHom.ext <| op_smul_eq_smul _⟩

name: Subsemiring.smul_mem_pointwise_smul_iff
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Group M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
a : M
S : Subsemiring R
x : R
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul a S) (HSMul.hSMul a x)) (Membership.mem S x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem smul_mem_pointwise_smul_iff {a : M} {S : Subsemiring R} {x : R} : a • x ∈ a • S ↔ x ∈ S :=
  smul_mem_smul_set_iff

name: Subsemiring.mem_pointwise_smul_iff_inv_smul_mem
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : Group M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
a : M
S : Subsemiring R
x : R
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul a S) x) (Membership.mem S (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) x))
decl:
theorem mem_pointwise_smul_iff_inv_smul_mem {a : M} {S : Subsemiring R} {x : R} :
    x ∈ a • S ↔ a⁻¹ • x ∈ S :=
  mem_smul_set_iff_inv_smul_mem

name: Subsemiring.mem_inv_pointwise_smul_iff
initialProofState:

S : Subsemiring R

⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) S) x) (Membership.mem S (HSMul.hSMul a x))
decl:
theorem mem_inv_pointwise_smul_iff {a : M} {S : Subsemiring R} {x : R} : x ∈ a⁻¹ • S ↔ a • x ∈ S :=
  mem_inv_smul_set_iff

name: Subsemiring.pointwise_smul_le_pointwise_smul_iff

⊢ Iff (LE.le (HSMul.hSMul a S) (HSMul.hSMul a T)) (LE.le S T)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem pointwise_smul_le_pointwise_smul_iff {a : M} {S T : Subsemiring R} :
    a • S ≤ a • T ↔ S ≤ T :=
  smul_set_subset_smul_set_iff

name: Subsemiring.pointwise_smul_subset_iff

M : Type u_1

inst✝² : Group M

⊢ Iff (LE.le (HSMul.hSMul a S) T) (LE.le S (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) T))
decl:
theorem pointwise_smul_subset_iff {a : M} {S T : Subsemiring R} : a • S ≤ T ↔ S ≤ a⁻¹ • T :=
  smul_set_subset_iff_subset_inv_smul_set

name: Subsemiring.subset_pointwise_smul_iff
initialProofState:

decl:
theorem subset_pointwise_smul_iff {a : M} {S T : Subsemiring R} : S ≤ a • T ↔ a⁻¹ • S ≤ T :=
  subset_smul_set_iff

name: Subsemiring.smul_mem_pointwise_smul_iff₀
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : GroupWithZero M
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction M R
a : M
ha : Ne a 0
S : Subsemiring R
x : R
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul a S) (HSMul.hSMul a x)) (Membership.mem S x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem smul_mem_pointwise_smul_iff₀ {a : M} (ha : a ≠ 0) (S : Subsemiring R) (x : R) :
    a • x ∈ a • S ↔ x ∈ S :=
  smul_mem_smul_set_iff₀ ha (S : Set R) x

@[simp]
theorem pointwise_smul_le_pointwise_smul_iff₀ {a : M} (ha : a ≠ 0) {S T : Subsemiring R} :

⊢ Iff (LE.le (HSMul.hSMul a S) T) (LE.le S (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) T))
decl:
theorem pointwise_smul_le_iff₀ {a : M} (ha : a ≠ 0) {S T : Subsemiring R} :
    a • S ≤ T ↔ S ≤ a⁻¹ • T :=
  smul_set_subset_iff₀ ha
